displayProperties.description: In any Crucible playlist, obtain an additional random Crucible bounty.
displayProperties.name: Additional Bounties

displayProperties.description: In Gambit, obtain an additional random Gambit bounty.
displayProperties.name: Additional Bounties

displayProperties.description: Obtain an additional random Vanguard bounty.
displayProperties.name: Additional Bounties

displayProperties.description: Obtain an additional random Gunsmith bounty.
displayProperties.name: Additional Bounties

displayProperties.description:
When triggered, a random finisher in your inventory plays.

If no finishers are in your inventory, your default class finisher plays.
displayProperties.name: Finishers

displayProperties.description: This item no longer serves a purpose and can be dismantled into Mod Components.
displayProperties.name: Fizzled Gear Mod

displayProperties.description: When acquired, will contain one of several possible Masterwork types.
displayProperties.name: Random Masterwork

displayProperties.description:
An engram with complex markers.

Contains a random Powerful Legendary weapon or armor piece.
displayProperties.name: Powerful Gear

displayProperties.description: We watch. We learn. We improve.
displayProperties.name: Twitch Bounty Reward: Match Reactions

displayProperties.description: When we witness greatness, we spread the word so that others can marvel in it with us.
displayProperties.name: Twitch Bounty Reward: Gifting Subs

displayProperties.description: By supporting our fellow Guardians, we support humanity's survival.
displayProperties.name: Twitch Bounty Rewards: Cheers

displayProperties.description:
Reset Rank, allowing you to earn additional Rank rewards. 

You will also receive an Ascendant Shard.
displayProperties.name: Reset Rank

displayProperties.description:
Reset Rank, allowing you to earn additional Rank rewards.  

You will also receive an Exotic engram with a predestined outcome.

Engram contains a new Exotic if any remain to be collected; otherwise contains a random Exotic armor item.
displayProperties.name: Reset Rank

displayProperties.description:
Reset Rank, allowing you to earn additional Rank rewards. 

You will also receive an Ascendant Alloy.
displayProperties.name: Reset Rank

displayProperties.description:
Reset Rank, allowing you to earn additional Rank rewards. 

You will also receive an Exotic Cipher and unlock access to Tier 3 Exotic focusing.
displayProperties.name: Reset Rank

displayProperties.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.
displayProperties.name: Glimmer

911043681.displaySource: Obtained from many sources in the world.

displayProperties.description: Auto-completes the Lightfall campaign and grants associated rewards, including the Strand subclass.
displayProperties.name: Lightfall Campaign Skip Boost

displayProperties.description:
Auto-completes The Final Shape campaign through Mission Iconoclasm, unlocking the Prismatic subclass, an additional Super for Light subclasses, and access to Mission Wild Card, the prelude to the 12-person Mission Excision.
 
Note that some Prismatic Abilities, Aspects, and Fragments are acquired via post-campaign pursuits or discovery. Purchase of this boost will not unlock these rewards.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape Campaign Skip Boost

displayProperties.description: An engram containing various Eververse ornaments, emotes, and accessories from previous Destiny 2 seasons.

displayProperties.description:
A medallion earned by achieving a Bronze score within activities during the Guardian Games event.

Deliver this to the podium to accrue rewards.

Available only during Guardian Games.
displayProperties.name: Bronze Medallion

displayProperties.description:
A medallion earned by achieving a Silver score within activities during the Guardian Games event.

Deliver this to the podium to accrue rewards.

Available only during Guardian Games.
displayProperties.name: Silver Medallion

displayProperties.description:
A medallion earned by achieving a Gold score within activities during the Guardian Games event.

Deliver this to the podium to accrue rewards.

Available only during Guardian Games.
displayProperties.name: Gold Medallion

displayProperties.description:
A medallion earned by achieving a Platinum score during the Guardian Games event.

Deliver this to the podium to accrue rewards.

Available only during Guardian Games.
displayProperties.name: Platinum Medallion

displayProperties.description:
Earned from transforming Silver Leaves by stoking the bonfire in the Bonfire Bash. Used to imbue Solstice armor with Embers.

Available only during Solstice.
displayProperties.name: Silver Ash

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

displayProperties.description:
Earned from completing and claiming Event Challenges.

Available only during Solstice.
displayProperties.name: Kindling

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

displayProperties.description:
Earned from completing activities while wearing Sunlit armor.

Available only during Solstice.
displayProperties.name: Silver Leaves

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

displayProperties.description:
Acquired by defeating combatants throughout the system while you are wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

Used to purchase exclusive rewards from Eva Levante in the Tower.

Available only during the Festival of the Lost.
displayProperties.name: Candy

displayProperties.description:
A sheet of parchment filled with illegible, ever-shifting script.

Acquired by completing activities while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask. Defeat Headless Ones in Haunted Sectors to transform this page.

Available exclusively during Festival of the Lost.
displayProperties.name: Spectral Page

displayProperties.description:
A sheet of parchment filled with indecipherable arcane script.

Return this page to The Book of the Forgotten in the Tower to decipher it.

Available exclusively during Festival of the Lost.
displayProperties.name: Manifested Page

displayProperties.description:
Ingredients used to bake cookies during the Dawning event. These can be acquired by defeating combatants throughout the system with specific elements, abilities, or weapon types.

Available only during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Ingredients

displayProperties.description:
Dawning Spirit can be redeemed through Eva to enhance your ability to spread holiday cheer.

Generated by delivering cookies and completing other Dawning objectives.

Available only during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Dawning Spirit

displayProperties.description:
The cheer you've spread has come full circle. Unwrap this gift to receive a Dawning exclusive weapon, Glimmer and substantial amount of experience as well as additional rewards.

Potential Rewards:
Destination resources
Upgrade Modules
Enhancement Prisms

Expires after Dawning.
displayProperties.name: A Gift in Return

displayProperties.description: Earn bonus Captain's Coins for completing strikes, Crucible, and Gambit activities with this emblem equipped.
displayProperties.name: Sequence Flourish

displayProperties.description: Used to acquire rewards from Xr, the Monument to Lost Lights, and focused Exotic engram decoding. You can only hold 5 of this item at a time.
displayProperties.name: Exotic Cipher

displayProperties.description: Present this to Commander Zavala in the Tower to claim a reward.
displayProperties.name: Nightfall Cipher (Adept)

displayProperties.description: Present this to Saint-14 in the Tower to claim a reward.
displayProperties.name: Osirion Cipher

displayProperties.description: Present this to the Monument of Lost Lights to receive a reward.
displayProperties.name: Forsaken Cipher

displayProperties.description: Used to convert an unlocked Hunter armor item to a universal ornament.

displayProperties.description: Used to convert an unlocked Titan armor item to a universal ornament.

displayProperties.description: Used to convert an unlocked Warlock armor item to a universal ornament.

displayProperties.description: Used to convert an unlocked armor item of any class to a universal ornament.
